text: Quote by Taimoor Madni: “Its just human nature. People forget past and o...”
text2: Its just human nature. People forget past and only care about their present and don't think what will happen in future... Taimoor Madni

text: “Don’t compare your life to others... There is no comparison between the sun and the moon. They shine when it’s their time.” - Unknown : r/quotes
text2: Don't compare your life to others. There's no comparison between the sun and the moon. They both shine when it's their time. Unknown

text: Quote by Niels Bohr: “An expert is a person who has made all the mist...”
text2: An expert is a man who has made all the mistakes which can be made, in a narrow field. Niels Bohr

text: Bob Iger - The heart and soul of the company is creativity...
text2: The heart and soul of a company is creativity and innovation. Bob Iger

text: John F. Kennedy - Those who dare to fail miserably can...
text2: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly. John F. Kennedy

text: Maria Montessori - If education is always to be conceived...
text2: If education is always to be conceived along the same antiquated lines of a mere transmission of knowledge, there is little to be hoped from it in the bettering of man's future. Maria Montessori

text: Quote by Ernest Hemingway: “The hard part about writing a novel is finishin...”
text2: The hard part about writing a novel is finishing it. Ernest Hemingway

text: Quote by William Shakespeare: “Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great...”
text2: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them. William Shakespeare

text: Quote by Aristotle: “Educating the mind without educating the heart ...”
text2: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all. Aristotle

text: Quote by William Shakespeare: “Lord, we know what we are, but know not what we...”
text2: We know what we are, but know not what we may be. William Shakespeare

text: Quote by William Shakespeare: “Our doubts are traitors, and make us lose the ...”
text2: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt. William Shakespeare

text: Natalie Gulbis - When you fail you learn from the mistakes...
text2: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder. Natalie Gulbis

text: Quote by Walt Disney: “If you can dream it, you can do it. Always reme...”
text2: If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse. Walt Disney

text: Thomas A. Edison - Our greatest weakness lies in giving...
text2: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. Thomas A. Edison

text: Quote by Jack Canfield: “Don't worry about failures, worry about the cha...”
text2: Don’t worry about failure, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try. Jack Canfield

text: Quote by Nelson Mandela: “The greatest glory in living lies not in never ...”
text2: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. Nelson Mandela

text: Quote by Walt Disney: “The way to get started is to quit talking and b...”
text2: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. Walt Disney

text: Steve Jobs - Your time is limited, so don't waste it...
text2: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. Steve Jobs

text: Quote by -Oprah Winfrey: “If you look at what you have in life, you'll al...”
text2: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough. Oprah Winfrey

text: James Cameron - If you set your goals ridiculously high...
text2: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success. James Cameron

text: Margaret Mead - Always remember that you are absolutely...
text2: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else. Margaret Mead

text: Robert Louis Stevenson - Don't judge each day by the...
text2: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant. Robert Louis Stevenson

text: Eleanor Roosevelt - The future belongs to those who...
text2: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Helen Keller - The best and most beautiful things in the...
text2: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched — they must be felt with the heart. Helen Keller

text: Aristotle Onassis - It is during our darkest moments that...
text2: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light. Aristotle

text: Quote by Anne Frank: “And whoever is happy will make others happy too...”
text2: And whoever is happy will make others happy too. He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery! Anne Frank

text: Thomas A. Edison - Many of life's failures are people who...
text2: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. Thomas A. Edison

text: Quote by Stephen Hawking: “I don't think the human race will survive the n...”
text2: I don't think the human race will survive the next thousand years, unless we spread into space. There are too many accidents that can befall life on a single planet. But I'm an optimist. We will reach out to the stars. Stephen Hawking

text: Stephen Hawking - The past, like the future, is indefinite...
text2: The past, like the future, is indefinite and exists only as a spectrum of possibilities. Stephen Hawking

text: Quote by Stephen Hawking: “One, remember to look up at the stars and not d...”
text2: One, remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Two, never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. Three, if you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away. Stephen Hawking

text: Quote by Daniel J. Boorstin: “The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignoranc...”
text2: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge. Daniel J. Boorstin

text: Quote by Oprah Winfrey: “We can't become what we need to be by remaining...”
text2: We can’t become what we need to be by remaining what we are. Oprah Winfrey

text: Albert Einstein - Strive not to be a success, but rather...
text2: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value. Albert Einstein

text: Quote by William Faulkner: “Don't bother just to be better than your contem...”
text2: Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself. William Faulkner

text: Oprah Winfrey - Lots of people want to ride with you in...
text2: Everyone wants to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down. Oprah Winfrey

text: Eleanor Roosevelt - If life were predictable it would...
text2: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor. Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Quote by Oscar Wilde: “Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.”
text2: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken. Oscar Wilde

text: Guido van Rossum on X: "In my high school senior year I was voted "least likely to invent his own programming language."" / X
text2: In my high school senior year I was voted "least likely to invent his own programming language." Guido van Rossum

text: Quote by Mark Twain: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started....”
text2: The secret to getting ahead is getting started. The secret to getting started is breaking your complex, overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks, and then starting on the first one. Mark Twain

text: Quote by Salvador Dali: “Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach...”
text2: Have no fear of perfection - you’ll never reach it. Salvador Dali

text: Quote by Maya Angelou: “You can't use up creativity. The more you use, ...”
text2: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have. Maya Angelou

text: Quote by steve jobs: “Design is not just what it looks like and feels...”
text2: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works. Steve Jobs

text: Emile Zola - The artist is nothing without the gift, but...
text2: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work. Emile Zola

text: Natalie Wood - The only time a woman really succeeds in...
text2: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby. Natalie Wood

text: Quote by Matshona Dhliwayo: “A flower blooming in the desert proves to the w...”
text2: A flower blooming in the desert proves to the world that adversity, no matter how great, can be overcome. Matshona Dhliwayo

text: Quote by Steve Jobs: “Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebe...”
text2: Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do. Steve Jobs

text: Quote by Billy Sunday: “Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian an...”
text2: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile. Billy Sunday

text: Paulo Coelho - One is loved because one is loved. No...
text2: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving. Paulo Coelho

text: Peter Drucker - Plans are only good intentions unless they...
text2: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work. Peter Drucker

text: Theodore Roosevelt - Believe you can and you're halfway...
text2: Believe you can and you're halfway there. Theodore Roosevelt

text: Quote by Rudy Francisco: “She asks me to kill the spider. Instead, I get...”
text2:
She asks me to kill the spider.
Instead, I get the most
peaceful weapons I can find.

I take a cup and a napkin.
I catch the spider, put it outside
and allow it to walk away.

If I am ever caught in the wrong place
at the wrong time, just being alive
and not bothering anyone,

I hope I am greeted
with the same kind
of mercy.

Rudy Francisco

text: "Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life." — Steve Jobs : r/quotes
text2: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Steve Jobs

text: Mark Twain - It is better to keep your mouth closed and...
text2: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt. Mark Twain

text: Albert Einstein - Learn from yesterday, live for today...
text2: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning. Albert Einstein

text: C. S. Lewis - If you look for truth, you may find comfort...
text2: If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end; if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth only soft soap and wishful thinking to begin, and in the end, despair. C. S. Lewis

text: Ralph Waldo Emerson - What lies behind you and what lies...
text2: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you. Ralph Waldo Emerson
